title: Parameters for Radar Fusion to Detected Object Node

core_params.bounding_box_margin.description: The distance to extend the 2D bird's-eye view Bounding Box on each side. This distance is used as a threshold to find radar centroids falling inside the extended box. [m]

core_params.split_threshold_velocity.description: The object's velocity threshold to decide to split for two objects from radar information (currently not implemented) [m/s]

core_params.threshold_yaw_diff.description: The yaw orientation threshold. If $ \vert \theta {ob} - \theta {ra} \vert < thresholdyaw_diff $ attached to radar information include estimated velocity, where $ \theta{ob} $ is yaw angle from 3d detected object, $ \theta_ {ra} $ is yaw angle from radar object. [rad]

core_params.velocity_weight_min_distance.description: The twist coefficient of radar data nearest to the center of bounding box in velocity estimation.

core_params.velocity_weight_average.description: The twist coefficient of average twist of radar data in velocity estimation.

core_params.velocity_weight_median.description: The twist coefficient of median twist of radar data in velocity estimation.

core_params.velocity_weight_target_value.description: The twist coefficient of target value weighted average in velocity estimation. Target value is amplitude if using radar pointcloud. Target value is probability if using radar objects.
The twist coefficient of top target value radar data in velocity estimation. Target value is amplitude if using radar pointcloud. Target value is probability if using radar objects.

core_params.convert_doppler_to_twist.description: Convert doppler velocity to twist using the yaw information of a detected object.

core_params.threshold_probability.description: If the probability of an output object is lower than this parameter, and the output object does not have radar points/objects, then delete the object.

core_params.compensate_probability.description: If this parameter is true, compensate probability of objects to threshold probability.
